<MemberDefinition

For buffered streams, commits changes to the backing store.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h/#l00264">264</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h">BinaryStreamRef.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamref-cpp/#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamref-cpp">BinaryStreamRef.cpp</a>.

### writeBytes() {#abd7a4936fd39218e5df5cb21a557c77b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error WritableBinaryStreamRef::writeBytes (uint64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data) const</>}>
Given an Offset into this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/writablebinarystreamref">WritableBinaryStreamRef</a> and some input data, writes the data to the underlying stream.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
a success error code if the data could fit within the underlying stream at the specified location and the implementation could write the data, and an appropriate error code otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h/#l00258">258</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamref-h">BinaryStreamRef.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamref-cpp/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamref-cpp">BinaryStreamRef.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
